name: PhotOSINT
description: OSINT tool for images. Scans page for images with EXIF metadata, while browsing. Also has context menu options for images.

content_security_policy.extension_pages: script-src 'self'; object-src 'self'; img-src * data: blob: 'unsafe-inline'; default-src *  data: blob: 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval'; connect-src * data: blob: 'unsafe-inline';
